column4: anyone use ubuntu to connect to a netdrive ? i have some issues getting connected
what issues?
and usr13     i can see the shares but it rejects my authentification
the drive is a dns 323 dlink drive
did u specify the user with -o user=username?
is it shared through samba?
it is connected directly to the router
whats the command you use to mount it?
it prompts me for name workgroup and password
does it even have a username setup?
i am suing the gui
yes
i see
and places see it under a windows network
using the ubuntu live cd i have been able to mount the drive but not with install
thats weird
yeah
try mouting it with smbfs. ie sudo apt-get install smbfs
ok will do
and to mount sudo mout -t cifs //drivename/sharename /mnt -o user=yourusername
if that returns without errors your drive will be mounted to /mnt
the sudo apt-get install smbfs doesnt work for me
